inair.view

Class UIScrollView

  • java.lang.Object
    • inair.data.DependencyObject
      • inair.data.IAElement
        • inair.view.UIView
          • inair.view.UIViewGroup
            • inair.view.UIScrollView
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IAInputElement, UIViewManager, UIViewParent

    public class UIScrollView
extends UIViewGroup

    UIScrollView presents a scrolling container

    Note this class is currently under early design and development. The API will likely change in later updates of the compatibility library, requiring changes to the source code of apps when they are compiled against the newer version.

    Copyright (c) 2014 SeeSpace.co. All rights reserved.
